ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

HU_STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 GenerateStringSession.py locally

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: Send .get_id in any group to fill this value.

PRIVATE_CHANNEL_BOT_API_ID.description: Send .get_id in any channel to fill this value. ReQuired for @Manuel15 inspiration to work!

TMP_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: This is required for the plugins involving the file system.

IBM_WATSON_CRED_USERNAME.description: This is required for the speech to text module. Get your USERNAME from https://console.bluemix.net/docs/services/speech-to-text/getting-started.html

IBM_WATSON_CRED_PASSWORD.description: This is required for the speech to text module. Get your PASSWORD from https://console.bluemix.net/docs/services/speech-to-text/getting-started.html

HASH_TO_TORRENT_API.description: This is required for the hash to torrent file functionality to work.

TELEGRAPH_SHORT_NAME.description: This is required for the @telegraph functionality.

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Get an API Key from http://OCR.Space

G_BAN_LOGGER_GROUP.description: Send .get_id in any group with all your administration bots (added)

TG_GLOBAL_ALBUM_LIMIT.description: How many media should appear when you do a .google image search? (setting a low value is preferred)

GOOGLE_SEARCH_COUNT_LIMIT.description: How many search result should appear when you do a .google search search? (setting a low value is preferred)

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Obtain a Telegram bot token by contacting @BotFather

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Obtain a Telegram bot @username by contacting @BotFather

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Get your own API key from https://www.remove.bg/ or feel free to use http://telegram.dog/Remove_BGBot

NO_P_M_SPAM.description: Set to True if you want to block users that are spamming your PMs.

MAX_FLOOD_IN_P_M_s.description: Define the number of consecutive messages a new user can send to your P.M. This should be a valid Integer.

NC_LOG_P_M_S.description: set to True if you want to log PMs to your PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: send .get_id in any channel to forward all your NEW PMs to this group

NO_OF_BUTTONS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Number of rows of modules that needs to be displayed in the .helpme command

COMMAND_HAND_LER.description: specify command handler that should be used for the plugins. This should be a valid "regex" pattern

SUDO_USERS.description: List down the user IDs who should have permission to use you.seperated by SPACE. Send .id in any private chat or as a reply to any user in any group, to fill this value

UB_BLACK_LIST_CHAT.description: Set blacklist_chats where you do not want userbot features

TZ.description: set your default time zone for time related features to work correctly. Value should match the string here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones

VERY_STREAM_LOGIN.description: Get your API key from https://verystream.com

VERY_STREAM_KEY.description: Get your API key from https://verystream.com

REPO_LINK.description: Set the link to your repo here to obtain it in telegram with .get repo

PACK_NAME.description: Set a sticker pack name to be used when making a sticker pack with .kang

LYDIA_API.description: Set your lydia api id to able to use lydia ai in telegram

PACKS_CONTENT.description: Set the content to be displayed when .get packs is executed in telegram

HEROKU_LINK.description: Set the link to your heroku webpage here to obtain it in telegram with .get heroku

ANIM_PACK_NAME.description: Set an animated sticker pack name to be used when making a sticker pack with .kang

TELE_GRAM_2FA_CODE.description: Your Telegram 2FA code as a string
